contexts.context: ...take it. But do not follow money blindly. There is <mark>value</mark> in reputation, more than many young Hlaalu realize. This...
...in reputation, more than many young Hlaalu realize. This <mark>value</mark> must be carefully balanced against the more tangible coins in any...
